title: Desk Nameplate
summary: Slanted nameplate with embossed text on a rectangular base.

parameters.plate_width: Overall width of the base along the X axis.
parameters.plate_height: Back edge height of the slanted face.
parameters.text_string: Text to emboss on the face.
parameters.font_size: Font size used for the text primitive.
parameters.text_depth: Extrusion depth of the embossed lettering.
parameters.tilt_angle: Angle between the face and the build surface.

notes: Illustrates linear extrude and projection of text onto an angled surface.
